basePermissions.title: Complexity needs your permissions to work

description.main: Store your preferences and settings locally in the extension's storage.
description.security: The extension has NO access to browser history, bookmarks, or any other data.
description.autoGrant: This permission is automatically granted when you install the extension.

description.intro: Sensitive cookies will never be stored or used outside Perplexity AI. The permission allows the extension to:

features.sync: Synchronize your Perplexity AI preferences (like color scheme and language settings) with the extension

description.warning: Without this permission, the extension will default to Dark mode and English language. Additionally, Supporter features will be unavailable. You can still enable this permission later.

basePermissions.additionalPermissionsHeadsUp: You may be prompted to grant additional permissions to certain features. Rest assured, you will always be asked for your consent before any action is taken.
